meanings.sent1: The field was the grassiest in the whole town.
meanings.sent2: The park with the grassiest meadows is my favorite.
meanings.sent3: The grassiest spot in the yard always attracts the most butterflies.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was the grassiest shade of green, like a meadow in spring.
meanings.sent5: The grassiest hill looked like a soft, green blanket spread across the landscape.

meanings.sent1: The artificial turf felt the grassiest under my feet.
meanings.sent2: The plant with the grassiest leaves turned out to be a weed.
meanings.sent3: The grassiest carpet in the store was surprisingly comfortable to walk on.
meanings.sent4: The grassiest fabric in the collection was perfect for the nature-themed design.
meanings.sent5: The grassiest texture of the material reminded me of a lush meadow.
